title: Victimised, Assimilised, Correctionalised
viewing_guidelines: Aboriginal and Islander viewers should note this work may contain images of deceased people and caution should be exercised when viewing.

abstract: After years of abuse, a journey of healing.
description: As a child, Howard Edwards was shunted from orphanage to orphanage. Made a ward of the state in 1956, he was abused and beaten wherever he was sent. His incarceration didn't end there and for much of his adult life Howard was a target for police and he was often locked up at the slightest provocation. A large part of Howard's journey towards healing involved reconnecting with his family, his work in the community and on the board of the Aboriginal Health Care Service.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2001977; Pitcha this : memories of Fitzroy : Foundation for Young Australians : Digital Storytelling project; Active; 2010
